details: This script is a Bash script that aids in the creation of LSF submit scripts. It takes various options such as job name, queue, memory, walltime, number of processors, nodes, processors per node, mail options, MPI/OpenMP flags, and flag explanations. It then generates an LSF script with the specified options. The script relies on the following external tools and resources: LSF (the LSF system for managing and submitting jobs), Bash (the Bash shell), and DCC modules (modules that might be needed for the job execution).
